
```{r 7.2}
flu_data <- flu_data %>% tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = Argentina:Uruguay,
                      names_to = "country", 
                      values_to = "value")
dengue_data <- dengue_data %>% tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = Argentina:Venezuela,

                      values_to = "value")
```
